definition: home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: The tutor is suspicious about the hermit's identity and leaves to summon reinforcements.
sentences.chinese: 这个家庭教师怀疑神父的身份，便离开去召集救兵。

sentences.english: The bear leader bear-led a group of wealthy young men on a cross-country hike.
sentences.chinese: 家庭教师带领一组富家子弟作越野远足。
家庭教师驾驶着一辆车子。

sentences.english: So he had a French tutor who lived with the family for a long time.
sentences.chinese: 他有一个法语家庭教师，住了在他家很久。

sentences.english: And, they could be a free tutor for their children.
sentences.chinese: 另外，她们还是自己子女的“免费家庭教师。

sentences.english: The tutor taught them how to twist threads together and how plant turnip.
sentences.chinese: 家庭教师教他们如何搓线和如何种植萝卜。

sentences.english: When she was eighteen, she went out as a governess.
sentences.chinese: 她在十八岁时外出担任家庭教师。

sentences.english: Once the tutor saw the twins. she liked them.
sentences.chinese: 一见面，家庭教师就喜欢这对双胞胎。

sentences.english: Tutors came to the palace to teach him to read and write.
sentences.chinese: 家庭教师来到宫殿里教他读书和写字。

sentences.english: There was nothing wrong with the children, only the governesses .
sentences.chinese: 孩子没怎么，只怪家庭教师。

sentences.english: When he was young, as was the custom, he had tutors.
sentences.chinese: 按风俗，他小的时候，有家庭教师。

sentences.english: The tutor used to be a typist, so she brought the typewriter with her.
sentences.chinese: 家庭教师过去曾是个打字员，因此随身带着打字机。

sentences.english: On the other side were the children with their tutors and governesses .
sentences.chinese: 儿童和男女家庭教师坐在另一旁。

sentences.english: You can find tutors for most major languages on the Internet.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在互联网上找到大部分主要语种的家庭教师。

sentences.english: She eked out her small income by working as a music tutor.
sentences.chinese: 当音乐家庭教师，借以弥补她那微薄收入的不足。

sentences.english: How many other governesses had these kinds of experiences?
sentences.chinese: 有多少女家庭教师有着这样的经历？

definition: family education/upbringing/to bring sb up/private tutor
school official responsible for supervising the students (old)
to give classes/to work as a teacher
